article_title: Four government ministers have contracted coronavirus in Burkina Faso and it’s spreading rapidly
article_description: Coronavirus couldn t have come at a worse time for Burkina Faso  Along with neighboring Sahelian countries  Mali and Niger  it is at the forefront of a brutal militant insurgency
article_content: Burkina Faso is one of the countries worst hit by the coronavirus on the continent  With 75 confirmed cases  it is Sub Saharan Africas second most affected country after South Africa  Just a few days ago it had fewer than 20 cases The virus is now ravaging    3073 chars
